headline: Lockheed Martin Balances Defense Contracts And Quantum Research As Valuation Steadies
summary: Lockheed Martin (NYSE:LMT) secured a foreign military sale to supply C-130J training devices and upgrades to the Royal Australian Air Force. The company also announced a research initiative with quantum computing firm Xanadu focused on Quantum Machine Learning. Both developments highlight fresh activity in global defense partnerships and advanced computing for potential national security use cases. For you as an investor, these updates relate to two core parts of Lockheed Martin’s story:...
